questions.content: A young girl embarks on a journey of self-discovery, despite parental objections, with a snarky human male companion and an animal friend.

universalHints.message: Girls feel trapped/limited by their environment.

hints.message: There is no love story component (or real villain).
Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson and Lin-Manuel Miranda are cast.
"If you wear a dress and have an animal sidekick, you're a princess."
"Whatever just happened... blame it on the pig."
Protagonist has a close, personal relationship with the antagonist.
Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Brad Garrett, and Ron Pearlman are cast.
"You want me to be the bad guy? Fine. Now I'm the bad guy."

questions.content: Orphaned sisters learn to cope with their losses and move on with their lives, learning the importance of their bond.

universalHints.message: The sisters lost their parents to a storm.

hints.message: Movie features a song sung by both the protagonist and antagonist.
Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, and Josh Gad are cast.
Wait... you got engaged to someone you just met that day?!
Movie features songs by a legendary rock singer.
Ving Rhames, David Ogden Stiers, and Daveigh Chase are cast.
"Don't worry. She likes your butt and fancy hair. I know. I read her diary."

questions.content: British explorers meet local savage types.

universalHints.message: Savage falls in love with one of the explorers.

hints.message: Titular character adopted as a baby after parents demise.
Minnie Driver, Rosie O'Donnell, and Glenn Close are cast.
"Now, you stay away from me. Like a very good wild man."
"Mom! Are you sure this water's sanitary? It looks questionable to me!"
A quarrel between two love interests of titular character leads to the death of one.
Mel Gibson and Christian Bale are cast.
"Listen with your heart. You will understand."

questions.content: The protagonist and antagonist prove that a person's quality of character does not correlate with their outward apperance.

hints.message: Protagonist is dissatifsied with the monotony of every day life.
Angela Lansbury, David Ogden Stiers, and Paige O'Hara are cast.
"You must control your temper!"
Protagonist grows up isolated from the society he's taught will reject him.
Demi Moore, Kevin Kline, and Jason Alexander are cast.
"By the way... great mask."

questions.content: Explorers search for an otherwise thought lost/mythical world and fortune.

universalHints.message: One or more of the exploration party betrays the original intellectual purpose/intent of the journey.

hints.message: Protagonist is an academic type and the first main character in a Disney movie to wear glasses.
Michael J. Fox/Leonard Nemoy/James Garner
"Hey, look, I made a bridge. It only took me like, what? Ten seconds? Eleven tops."
Take on a classic novel by Robert Louis Stevenson
Joseph Gordon Levitt/Emma Thompson/David Hyde Pierce
"When the time comes you get the chance to really test the cut of your sails and show what you're made of, well, I hope I'm there catching some of the light coming off you that day"

questions.content: A social outcast with a heart of gold proves himself in the eyes of a higher authority, falling in love along the way.

universalHints.message: The protagonist has a flying mode of transportation.

hints.message: Main character learns early on he is adopted and searches for his birth parents.
James Woods, Danny Devito, and Rip Torn are cast.
"Will you forget the head slicing thing?!"
The second time the titular character meets his love interest it is under false pretenses.
Gilbert Gottfreid and Robin Williams are cast.
"Enough about you, Casanova. Talk about her. She's smart. Fun. The hair. The eyes. Anything. Pick a feature!"

questions.content: A girl who defies culturally accepted norms disguises her true identity for the sake of a man in her life.

universalHints.message: The girl puts her life at risk by disguising herself.

hints.message: Disguises identity through magical means.
Jodi Benson
"Don't underestimate the importance of body language!"
Companion has self motivations for helping the main character.
B.D. Wong/Pat Morita/George Takei
The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of them all.

questions.content: A selfish man is turned into an animal and then humbled by the experience.

universalHints.message: Person changed is a man of royalty.
Man chooses to remain the animal he becomes.

hints.message: The female protagonist is an aspiring entreprenuer.
John Goodman/Keith David/Jennifer Lewis
"I don't have time for dancing. That's just gonna have to wait awhile."
Antagonist has a perpetually cheerful, yet slightly dimwitted henchperson.
John Goodman/David Spade/Patrick Warburton
"Oh, he's doing his own theme music? Big, dumb, and tone deaf. I am so glad I was unconscious for all of this."
Man is turned into the kind of animal he kills
Joaquin Phoenix/Rick Moranis
"When I get in a fight, I go all crazy and I'm a raging ball of brown fur!"
